text: Carlos Marín Menchero (13 October 1968 – 19 December 2021) was a Spanish baritone. He was a member of the classical crossover group Il Divo. Marín died from problems caused by COVID-19 on 19 December 2021, in Manchester, England at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom Category:Spanish singers Category:German singers
title: Carlos Marín
